title.rendered: STEDI UNIVERSAL TYPE B LED FOG LIGHT CONVERSION KIT

content.rendered:
STEDI’s new Type B Universal LED Fog Light is designed to replace your factory fog lights to a brighter beam with better fog penetration for much more visibility.

DETAILS

KEY TECHNICAL DETAILS 

These LED fog lights are a direct fit which uses your factory mounting points in behind the standard front bumper, and some aftermarket bull bars listed below.

The projector lens optic distributes a very flat and extremely wide pattern which is DOT and ECE standard compliant for road use.

 Once installed we recommend that the beam is adjusted to ensure that it cuts off no higher than 50cm from the ground, with the car 25m away from a wall. 

Please check below for a full list of compatible vehicles. 

COMPATIBLE VEHICLES:

LEXUS

  • LX570: 2008 – 2011
  • IS-F: 2008 – 2013
  • HS250H: 2010 – 2012
  • RX270 / RX350 / RX450: 2010 – 2015
  • GS350: 2013 – 2015
  • LX570: 2013 – 2017

TOYOTA

  • 4 RUNNER: 2014 – 2017
  • AURION: 2007 – 2017
  • AURIS: 2007 – 2017
  • AVALON: 2008 – 2010
  • CAMRY:7/2006 – 11/2011
  • CAMRY HYBRID: AHV40 2010 – 2011
  • COROLLA: 3/2007 to  2013
  • FORTUNER: 2015 – 2017
  • KLUGER: 2007 – 2017
  • N80 (Revo) HILUX: 2016 – present
  • N70 (Vigo) HILUX: 2012 – 2015 (face-lift)  
  • HIGHLANDER HYBRID: 2008 – 2013
  • LANDCRUISER PRADO 150:2009 – 2018
  • PRIUS: 2009 – 2015
  • PRIUS C: 2012 – 2017
  • RAV 4: 2006 – 2011
  • RAV 4: 2016 – 2017
  • TUNDRA: 2013 – 2017
  • YARIS: 2014 – 2017

PEUGEOT

  • 206: 1998 – 2005
  • 206 SPORT: 1998 – 2005

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL Alloy Heat Sink
LED High Performance Luxeon T LED
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE 12v and 24v
LIFESPAN 50,000hours
CONNECTOR TYPE Sealed
CERTIFICATION CE, E4, RoHs, R87, IP67
FOG LIGHT DRAW 0.5a @ 13.6v
DIAMETER 90mm

 

OEM PART NO#

R: 81210-0D040 + L: 81220-0D040 / R: 81210-0D041 + L: 81220-0D041
R: 81210-0D042 + L: 81220-0D042 / R: 81210-06052 + L: 81220-06050
R: 35501-57L00 + L: 35502-57L01 / R: 81210-06071 + L: 81220-06071
R: 81025-0W020 + L: 81026-0W020 / R: 81211-12230 + L: 81221-12230
R: 81210-12230 + L: 81220-12230 / R: 81210-0D110 + L: 81220-0D110
R: 81210-02110 + L: 81220-02110

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x STEDI Universal Type B Fog Lights
  • Fasteners Included

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
